koja actually similar cook rice long water evaporates rice gets stuck pot im glad see able reach balance inner chunk rice patties steamrice soft outer layer crisp ordered zen koja soy patty however bit misled menu thought large piece portobello mushroom inside theres actually bits pieces mushroom contained patty overall taste wouldve awesome following 3 drawbacks 1 terrible temperature control kojas patty filling warm eat soy patty hot result wait patty cool down2 koja thick hard bite even harder hold perhaps modify design bit3 much oil seeping filling paper wrap bit saltybonus call biased background sound theyre playing weird

youre ever mood sitdown style truck hip fresh location spot try bay area gem koreanjapanese infused sitting close proximity school definitely something knew appreciated open restaurant terms space cleaner restaurants area two times went packed came quickly far tried beef koja kamikaze fries ahi tuna bowl found filling delicious pack much flavor dishes dont try ration portions like truck style places come friend id definitely recommend sharing kamakazi fries trying either bowl koja ahi tuna bowl similar tastes pokistyle bowls koja like better version american burger theres much flavor packed beef rice style bun crispy tasty havent tried koja kitchen yet please flavor yes meant flavor

yummy gourmet koreanjapanese fusion sammiches love garlic rice buns especially since feel like ratio bread filling always sandwichesthis location near uc berkeleys campus parking isnt great street parking youre going monsat youll pay meter pricey 25 cents buys 4 minutes got chicken koja fries amazing everything super fresh flavorful portion sizes look small itll definitely fill however koja doesnt hold structurally half filling overflowingspilling far pricing expensive side youre getting definite treat recommend youre looking savory bite

stopped couple times since within walking distance apartment confirm consistent quality expect walking koja last time ordered ahi tuna bowl surprised generous portion koja doesnt tend give large serving wasnt expecting much bowl worth price paid little less 11 ahi tuna soso combination crispy fried toppings salad rice created winning combo

went catch friend recommended try thought korean barbecue burger rice buns intrigued make stop sitdown restaurant clean sleek came line started forming able table got short rib koja kamikaze fries friend chicken koja waited couple minutes came relatively fast short rib cooked perfectly favorite cut truly delivered great product wellmarinated juicy delicious friend enjoyed chicken say little hard eat stuffed kamikaze fries wild actual fries sauces top took new level satisfying service point workers problems taking time clarify items menufor portions receive price fair although little high want go short rib fries definitely unique enjoy

first heard wanted try right away since live cal knew wouldnt anytime soon  i flew cal short trip koja first stop got early wasnt busy yet  i decided beef koja kamikaze fries  the beef koja kbbq beef sautéed onions lettuce sliced pineapple spicy sauce two crispy chewy rice patties act bun sesame seeds sprinkled top  the combination fantastic  next time ill add kimchi  i add siracha  the kamikaze fries waffle cut fries bulgogi beef minced kimchi green onions spicy sauce top  both items delish worth going  there street parking front parking structure diagonal offers first hour free  i liked koja want try flavors  hope open joint near soon

koja okay might due coming less popular time nothing made go wow restaurant clean energetic cashiersi ordered braised pork koja kamikaze fries came warmto point buns started hardening making less enjoyable consume rush didnt time wait another order come ended grabbing fork eat filling kamikaze fries leaving famous buns aside fries bad besides lukewarmness flavors koja creates lovely meld ill come back probably better time try kojas little messy eating everything nothing napkin cant save

korean great satisfying stop definitely try original shortrib koja enjoyed friend rice sandwich comes crunchy yummy tbe fries worth trying went group 5 friends everyone ordered different things liked located california small indoor seating prepare quickly worth checking sure

definitely hype came little shack expecting another hyped business yet surprise great definitely come back area service 55 cashier extremely welcoming answered questions although long line came reasonable pace excellent service short rib koja 55 cashier recommended perfectly cooked seasoned highly recommend  teriyaki zen koja 55 instead meat replaced braised portobello mushroom vegan friend approved kamikaze fries 55 criss cut fries beef kimchi japanese mayo oh god yummy

boyfriend chicken bones chicken tacos koja heck man even fact tacos less 3 shouldnt tacos first wasnt even cooked fresh warm cold tortilla cold chicken fries drenched sauce meat wasnt even warm looked like lazy wednesday workers dont complain managerwhy dont refundif bf going eat long day work wouldnt go bs cold sayin

literally got lunch rush first time rice patty burger lot harder looks hard crunchy goodness burger didnt think mouth could open big enough everything bite ended eating apart fork ordering getting painless quick seating fill quickly worse worse easy togo mealour order beef chicken koja rice patty crunchy outside reminds bottom clay pot rice dishes soft inside chicken flavorful moist always worry chicken dislike dry chicken like literally wont eat beef delicious little tough nevertheless delicious sesame vinaigrette perfect lettuce needed little acidity theres spicy gochujang sauce wasnt spicy could though umami fries super delicious covered w toppings heavy though filled little quickly top heavy sauce id grab fries bottom dip strawberry mango mint lemonade refreshing needs mint flavor didnt taste final thoughts ill definitely back try mochimisu slush version strawberry mango mint lemonade

tasty little heavy sauce especially kamikaze fries cutting back sauce make everything 10x better hmm maybe ill try asking next time im highlights favorite part crispy rice bun menukamikaze fries thing try youre super heavy sauce gets little overpowering gotta love waffle fries beef koja burger nom nom noms meat marinated flavored pineapple adds nice sweet tang overall taste rice bun balances flavors great snack youre hungry something filling salty sweet

kitschy kojas fun fast youre need quick snack  kojas make think spam musubi steroids  addicting little buggers might ohsotasty  i got chicken koja 625 korean bbq chicken wickedly doused spicy gochujang sauce  it accompanied bit tomato lettuce made crunchy sesame seeds rice cake sandwich finished squirt lemon wedge perfect deadly combo  enjoy

going koja kitchen richmond city moved excited koja right telegraph however first time trying first tried use eat24 order since yelp conveniently directs reason didnt let order close closing time something maybe eat24 lessthan stellar appbecause come people picking go orders anyway sitting couch tried phone order dont take phone orders hell like theyre trying 21stcentury ordering theyre slipping 19th century please allow people order phone sometimes dont access internet driving easier put phone order

first tried guys grid trucks always must go trucks winter know fix sit spot ordered usual beef koja kamikaze fries reasons cant quite point hype sit wasnt truck maybe theres something anticipating youre waiting line awhile review definitely sauce overload kamikaze fries mean gotta take meat eat fries tells much oh idk gave wrong order changed put beef koja pineapple mine didnt mind though cut salt sauce beef minus star location wasnt service quick friendly real complaint trash overflowing right next napkinsutensils soda machine

went koja kitchen cousins visit idea going put beef koja cousin ordered unique something never experienced life beef koja uses rice shaped bun instead conventional bread bun allowed marvelous order rice keep shape grilled grilling rice gives harddry texture however dressing marinate meat compensate totally makes delectable  their kamikaze fries delicious wide range flavors spicy sweet best part koja kitchen despite eating burger style sandwich feel bloated heavy afterwards wonderful thing walking required fully prices moderate overall come back future

youll find trendy places wont see sf jumped us looking eat near campus korean japanese fusion sounds true intriguing didnt see anything better walked service ok nothing special could better seemed like young people going motions combos sounded enticing included bowls great could include kojas combosi ordered koja sounded new interesting pleasantly delighted veggie koja big portobello mushroom tasty satisfying whod known looked tiny surprisingly filling crisp rice bun nutty crunchy delicious brownish liquidy sauce tasty usually portobello veggie burgers plain disappointing winner companion ordered chicken bowl didnt look beautiful special koja fries wasnt flavorful decorambiance runofthemill youd expect trendy little eatery college town wish less open doorway wish places cozy comfortable better meals potential make consistent everything delicious veggie koja
